item.title: Marvel Select Barbarian Hulk Action Figure
item.description: Based on his look in the pages of Marvel's Incredible Hulk comics, this massive green figure with long hair, a loincloth, and a necklace of skulls has been sculpted by Jean St. Jean in excellent fashion. It's the Hulk figure you never knew you wanted! The Marvel Select Barbarian Hulk Action Figure stands nearly 10-inches tall, with 16 points of articulation, ready to display in oversized collector packaging. He's all set to fight your other Hulk toys for prime placement in your collection!

item.title: Marvel Select Black Cat Action Figure
item.description: The Marvel Select Black Cat Action Figure portrays the former love of Spider-Man, Felicia Hardy (also known as the Black Cat), who has starred in her own series written by the immensely popular Kevin Smith (Clerks, Bluntman and Chronic). Black Cat is captured in all her feline finery, along with a detailed diorama base with an opening safe filled with loot, and a full-sized, removable, non-articulated Spider-Man Figure clinging to the wall!

item.title: Marvel Select Abomination Action Figure
item.description: The unstoppable Marvel Select figure of Emil Blonsky-- a.k.a. Abomination-- stands over 9-inches tall and features multiple points of articulation, plus a deluxe display base to showcase the fantastic sculpt. Emil Blonsky became the hideous creature known as Abomination when his attempt to become the next Incredible Hulk went horribly wrong. Forced to remain in his grotesque form, Abomination is at times even more powerful than the Hulk-- though getting angry has no effect.

item.title: Marvel Select Amazing Spider-Man Action Figure
item.description: Peter Parker returns in The Amazing Spider-Man, and Marvel Select is there to make its film-based figure of the ol' web-slinger. Showing Spidey in his movie outfit, this 7-inch scale action figure sports 16 points of articulation for a variety of action poses, as well as 2 alternate hands! Spider-Man also comes with a New York City display base that can stand on your shelf or hang on your wall! The figure and base come in oversized collector packaging, too.

item.title: Marvel Select Anti-Venom Action Figure
item.description: Fresh from the pages of the The Amazing Spider-Man comics, Anti-Venom is featured with a deluxe, symbiotic base and multiple points of articulation Making his Marvel Select debut, this awesome character is set to be a sure-fire hit!

item.title: Dragon Nick Fury Vignette
item.description: A hybrid between a display figure and a kit, Dragon brings you the best of both worlds. The use of model kit techniques allow us reproduce the intricate details and sharp lines to maximize the usage of the official 3D character scans. The use of the static display concept ensures that there are no cooling lines on the torsos and no visible ball joints that are prominent in most "action" figures. Additionally, the figures are set in a Marvel suggested pose so that the body portions won't be deformed when the poses are changed. Each Vignette comes pre-colored, unassembled, and includes a diorama display base.

item.title: Dragon Hawkeye Vignette
item.description: A hybrid between a display figure and a kit, Dragon brings you the best of both worlds. The use of model kit techniques allow us reproduce the intricate details and sharp lines to maximize the usage of the official 3D character scans. The use of the static display concept ensures that there are no cooling lines on the torsos and no visible ball joints that are prominent in most "action" figures. Additionally, the figures are set in a Marvel suggested pose so that the body portions won't be deformed when the poses are changed. Each Vignette comes pre-colored, unassembled, and includes a diorama display base.

item.title: Marvel Select Bucky as Captain America Action Figure
item.description: Showcased in Captain America #34, join James Buchanan "Bucky" Barnes as he picks up where Steve Rogers left off and proves that no matter what, Captain America will never die. Superbly sculpted by Sam Greenwell and featuring 14 points of articulation, this dramatic, 7-inch tall arch-patriot also includes a wall-mountable, cityscape display base. He's an exceptional addition to your growing gathering of super superheroes!

item.title: Marvel Select Captain America First Avenger Figure
item.description: This time the movie Captain America, The First Avenger makes its Marvel Select debut! Based on the likeness of actor Chris Evans from the blockbuster movie, this movie-accurate Captain America Figure stands 7-inches tall and includes Marvel Select's standard 16 points of articulation. As an added bonus, the figure comes packaged with part of a display stand that can be combined with the base from the Red Skull movie figure to form a diorama, recreating a key scene from the movie! Red Skull sold separately. Includes Captain America Shield, gun, and more!

item.title: Marvel Select Captain Marvel Action Figure
item.description: Featuring the biggest Mar-Vell of the modern age, this 7" figure features multiple points of articulation and a detailed base complete with a crashed Skrull ship

item.title: Marvel Select Chitauri Footsoldier Action Figure
item.description: With 16 points of articulation and a detailed display base, this Chitauri Footsoldier will be the crowning jewel in any Avengers movie toy collection! The action figure comes in oversized collector packaging and is only available on the speciality market

item.title: Marvel Select Colossus Action Figure
item.description: The iconic heart and soul of so many X-Men teams, the metal-skinned mutant comes with a Danger Room robotic-vise obstacle that's in scale with all previous Danger Room accessories. This Colossus Action Figure includes Marvel Select's standard 16 points of articulation and measures over 8-inches tall. You can even combine his base with those of Gambit and Cyclops to form a Danger Room diorama! Gambit and Cyclops sold separately.

item.title: Marvel Select Cyclops Action Figure
item.description: This 7-inch tall Marvel Select Action Figure features the mutant in his most famous classic look. It features an interchangeable unmasked head, multiple points of articulation, anda Danger Room base for the ultimate X-Men display!

item.title: Marvel Select Daredevil Action Figure
item.description: Each Marvel Select figure stands over 7-inches tall and features multiple points of articulation, plus one-third of a deluxe three-part urban display base. Sculpted by Sam Greenwell, this classic Daredevil is perfect for any superheroic collection or the casual Fan With No Fear!

item.title: Marvel Select Deadpool Action Figure
item.description: Sculpted by Gabriel Marquez, this 7-inch tall portrayal of the infamous "Merc with a Mouth" depicts Deadpool in his most iconic costume and features 16 points of articulation. Also included is a deluxe base showing a damaged wall and street. It's perfect for on-shelf display!

item.title: Marvel Select Gambit Action Figure
item.description: While his debut was shrouded in mystery, he quickly became one of the most popular members of the X-Men! Featuring Marvel Select's standard 16 points of articulation, as well as multiple hands and accessories, Gambit comes with a similarly themed Danger Room base like Cyclops, allowing collectors to create a mini diorama!

item.title: Marvel Select Green Goblin Action Figure
item.description: Marvel Select gives their take on one of the Marvel Universe's most popular villains! Spider-Man's longtime nemesis, Norman Osborne, has never looked more menacing, wearing a detailed, modernized sculpt of the classic Green Goblin costume. Equipped with Marvel Select's standard 16 points of articulation, this 7" figure can perch on top of his included base, a perfectly balanced Goblin Glider wrapped in smoke. The Green Goblin comes in oversized collector packaging, ready for display.

item.title: Marvel Select Avengers Movie Hulk Action Figure
item.description: With the Hulk appearing in the box office behemoth Avengers movie, this 7 inch -scale figure based on Dr. Bruce Banner's latest look. Utilizing digital data from the film, the figure will stand over 8inches tall and feature 16 points of articulation, and will look great along side your existing Avengers Select figures. Only available on the specialty market, the Hulk comes in over sized collector packaging, ready for display.

item.title: Marvel Select Invincible Iron Man Action Figure
item.description: Complete with accessories, over 14 points of articulation, and a striking deluxe base,not even the Mandarin can stop this legendary hero as he battles a new era of enemies. This is one heavy hero you can't pass up! Iron Man comes with a detailed display base in oversized collector packaging, and is only available on the specialty market!

item.title: Marvel Select Avengers Movie Iron Man Action Figure
item.description: Depicting Tony Stark in the armor he wears through much of the film, this figure stands 7.5 inches tall with 16 points of articulation, and comes with a removable mask that can be displayed in open or closed position. Iron Man is in scale to all Marvel Select Avengers movie figures and comes with a detailed display base in over sized collector Avengers movie packaging

item.title: Marvel Select Lizard Action Figure
item.description: A new movie means a new villain for Spider-Man to battle, and Marvel Select is there to bring the Lizard to life! Capturing the Amazing Spider-Man movie look of Dr. Curt Connors, a.k.a. the cold-blooded Lizard, this 7" scale figure features 16 points of articulation, for endless reptile-on-spider action! Figure comes displayed in oversized collector packaging, and is only available on the specialty market.

item.title: Marvel Select Magneto Action Figure
item.description: Sculpted by Gabriel Marquez, this highly detailed 7 tall action figure of the enemy of humankind features 16 points of articulation and perfectly captures the mighty Magneto. A special post-battle display is also included, which features the aftermath of a battle with various magnetic items a strewn amongst the rubble along with the body of a fallen enemy that's buried underneath the rubble.

item.title: Marvel Select Nightcrawler Action Figure
item.description: Standing 7-inches tall, Nightcrawler features multiple points of articulation, and comes with another section of the Danger Room as well as a"bamf" cloud representing his teleportation power. Nightcrawler comes in collector's display packaging

item.title: Marvel Select Punisher Action Figure
item.description: This figure was inspired by the now historic Punisher run by writer Garth Ennis that featured striking covers by Tim Bradstreet, and brought The Punisher from back to the forefront of the Marvel Universe. Sculptor Steve Kiwus has captured every detail of Tim's art and the violence of Garth's stories. This figure comes complete with Spider-Man pinball machine, bar wall and tortured informant.

item.title: Marvel Select Red Hulk Action Figure
item.description: A mysterious agenda-motivated character, the Red Hulk is noteworthy in that he wields immense strength alongside undiminished faculties and a resourceful intellect. Red Hulk comes with a detailed display base in oversized collector packaging, and is only available on the specialty market!

item.title: Marvel Select Incredible Hulk Action Figure
item.description: Radiating rage and exuding intensity, this shocking 8-inch tall behemoth includes 14 points of articulation and a deluxe rubble base that exhibits the effects of a Hulk attack. Sculpted by Gabriel Marquez, each rampaging Hulk figure brings a world-shaking mainstay of the Marvel Universe to you... just in time to make (or break) your day. Give yourself a treat by grabbing him while you can! This genuinely "incredible" figure arrives packaged in a blister card.

item.title: Marvel Select Red Skull Action Figure
item.description: Sculpted by Gentle Giant Studios! The best-selling Marvel Select line is proud to add another of the Marvel movie franchises to its lineup! This time, the movie Captain America: The First Avenger makes its Marvel Select debut! Based on the likeness of the villainous Red Skull from the summer 2011 blockbuster played by Hugo Weaving, this movie-accurate figure includes Marvel Select's standard 16 points of articulation. As an added bonus, the figure comes packaged with part of a display stand that can be combined with the base from the Captain America movie figure (sold separately) to form a diorama, recreating a key scene from the movie!

item.title: Marvel Select Rhino Action Figure
item.description: The leather-skinned Spider-Man foe stands over 8 inches tall with 16 points ofarticulation, and is ready to tear through your Marvel toy collection like tissue paper. Comes ready to display in oversized collector packaging and is only available on the speciality market

item.title: Marvel Select Sabretooth Action Figure
item.description: From the pages of Marvel Comics history, Sabretooth is depicted with his classic costume and features a deluxe base and multiple points of articulation. Designed by Dig Deep Entertainment and sculpted by Gentle Giant, this is one heavy-hitting mutant you don't want to miss! Sabretooth comes with a detailed display base in oversized collector packaging, and is only available on the specialty market!

item.title: Marvel Select Spider-Man Action Figure
item.description: This highly detailed Marvel Select Spider-Man stands over seven inches tall and has multiple points of articulation, so you can pose him in almost any way you like. Also included with the figure is a deluxe display base which resembles a crushed car, this can be used to stand Spidey on a shelf or any flat surface. Fans of Spider-Man comics, films or cartoons will love this classic Spider-Man Action Figure.

item.title: Marvel Select Spider-Woman Action Figure
item.description: Sculpted by Sam Greenwell and standing 7" tall, the Marvel Select Spider-Woman figure features a highly-detailed base, plus three partial figures of Hydra agents to create an action scene.

item.title: Marvel Select Storm Action Figure
item.description: Standing 7" high, Storm features multiple points of articulation, and comes with another section of the Danger Room featuring saw and torch pieces. Storm comes in oversized collector packaging and is only available on the speciality market.

item.title: Marvel Select Thanos Action Figure
item.description: With the cosmically-charged Infinity Gauntlet in his grasp, Thanos nearly wiped out every living being in the universe, and would have succeeded if not for the intervention of some of the Marvel Universe's greatest heroes! With 14 points of articulation, the Thanos figure is a detailed representation of the villainous legend, complete with a removable Infinity Gauntlet and a scale unarticulated Death figure

item.title: Marvel Select Venom Action Figure
item.description: Marvel toy collectors have been clamoring for it for years, and we're finally giving it to them -- a figure of the classic Spider-Man villain Venom! Depicting the original Venom, Eddie Brock, this symbiotic Spidey foe stands over 8 inches tall with 16 points of articulation, and comes packaged with a detailed display base in oversized collector packaging.

item.title: Marvel Select The Thing Action Figure
item.description: Featuring a rock-solid sculpt by Digger and measuring over eight inches tall, this all-new Marvel Select figure features multiple points of articulation and a classic Marvel Comics design!

item.title: Marvel Select Thor Action Figure
item.description: Taken from J. Michael Straczynski's Thor series, this exciting 7-inch scale figure features the mighty Thor sporting his new chain-mail costume design and signature weapon. With over 14 points of articulation and a deluxe floating Asgard base, not even Loki himself can stop this legendary god as he battles a new era of enemies. Handsomely sculpted by Gentle Giant, this is one hero you can't pass up!

item.title: Marvel Select Ultron Action Figure
item.description: The unkillable robotic creation of Dr. Hank Pym, Ultron is depicted in his classic form, in the same 7-inch scale as the rest of the Marvel Select line. Plus, he comes with a detailed display base depicting the fallen forms of Ant-Man and the Wasp, and features multiple points of articulation, for a variety of humanity-despising poses. Ultron comes in oversized collector packaging and is only available on the speciality market

item.title: Play Arts Kai Arkham Asylum Batman Action Figure
item.description: Featuring over 26 points of articulation, this exquisite figure comes to life with stunning poseability. Batman Armoured includes interchangeable hands and his trademark weapons and accessories. With unsurpassed quality in paint application and detailed texture the Batman: Arkham Asylum Batman Armoured figure makes a great addition to your Batman collection!

item.title: Play Arts Kai Arkham Asylum Harley Quinn Action Figure
item.description: Featuring over 26 points of articulation, this exquisite figure comes to life with stunning poseability. Harley Quinn includes interchangeable hands and her trademark weapons and accessories. With unsurpassed quality in paint application and detailed texture the Batman : Arkham Asylum Harley Quinn figure makes a great addition to your Batman collection!

item.title: Play Arts Kai Dark Knight Returns Action Figure
item.description: Featuring over 26 points of articulation, this exquisite figure comes to life with stunning poseability. Batman includes interchangeable hands and her trademark weapons and accessories. Based on Frank Miller's seminal book The Dark Knight Returns, this fantastic figure brings something very special to anyone's Batman collection.

item.title: Play Arts Kai Arkham City Batman Action Figure
item.description: Featuring over 26 points of articulation, this exquisite figure comes to life with stunning poseability. Batman includes interchangeable hands and her trademark weapons and accessories.

item.title: Play Arts Kai Arkham City Catwoman Action Figure
item.description: Featuring over 26 points of articulation, this exquisite figure comes to life with stunning poseability. Catwoman includes interchangeable hands and her trademark weapons and accessories.

item.title: Play Arts Kai Arkham City Robin Action Figure
item.description: Featuring over 26 points of articulation, this exquisite figure comes to life with stunning poseability. Robin includes interchangeable hands and his trademark weapons and accessories.

item.title: Kotobukiya Batman Black Costume ArtFX Statue
item.description: Highly detailed sculpt and paint shadowing reveal Bruce Wayne's muscular physique, trained to the peak of human perfection, under the Batman outfit. The new black and grey costume colors lend a darker, grittier look to the caped crusader, making him blend in better with the night, but he'll still look great on your display shelves!

item.title: Kotobukiya Batman vs Joker ArtFX Statue
item.description: Sculpted by Junnosuke Abe, this sensational plastic sculpture stands nearly 12-inches tall (1:6 scale) on a special display base that really shows off the action of the scene. Batman and Joker look great on their own or alongside any of the other dynamic Batman statues from Kotobukiya (sold separately). No DC Comics or Batman fan should be without the Dark Knight Returns Batman vs. Joker ArtFX Statue in his or her collection!

item.title: Kotobukiya Dark Knight Rises ArtFX Statue
item.description: Behold the Dark Knight! Kotobukiya presents this breathtaking ArtFx statue based on The Dark Knight Rises. Sculpted by Mic, Batman The Dark Knight Rises towers over 15-inches tall (1:6 scale) on a rocky display base that includes a hidden light-up Bat-Symbol! Perfect for both longtime Batman collectors and fans of the movie, this Caped Crusader looks fantastic on his own or next to other dynamic Kotobukiya Batman statues (sold separately). With interchangeable parts, you can display him with either a grapple gun or his EMP rifle!

item.title: Batman Unlimited New 52 Batgirl Action Figure
item.description: These 7-inch scale action figures draw inspiration from the editorial heritage of the comic-style brand, with each figure highly detailed and articulated for you Batman fans. Don't miss a single one!

item.title: Batman Unlimited New 52 Batman Action Figure
item.description: These 7-inch scale action figures draw inspiration from the editorial heritage of the comic-style brand, with each figure highly detailed and articulated for you Batman fans. Don't miss a single one!

item.title: Batman Unlimited Planet X Batman Action Figure
item.description: This Batman of Zur-En-Arrh is from Batman #680 and is delusional personality manufactured by Bruce himself to keep Batman able to fight in case he was mindwiped, or driven to insanity. The Planet X Batman action figure stands 7-inches tall in amazing detail and articulation. Batman is shown here in his purple, red, and yellow Batsuit. Batmite stands 3-inches tall and comes in his gray and black Batsuit.

item.title: Batman Unlimited The Dark Knight Returns Action Figure
item.description: The Batman Dark Knight Returns action figure stands 7-inches tall in amazing detail and articulation. Batman is shown here in his black and gray Batsuit on a much larger body.

item.title: DC Collectibles Dark Knight Returns Action Figure Box Set
item.description: Based on Frank Miller's now-legendary designs, this is a must-have for fans of Miller's seminal classic.

The use of the static display concept ensures that there are no cooling lines on the torsos and no visible ball joints that are prominent in most "action" figures. Additionally, the figures are set in a DC suggested pose so that the body portions won't be deformed when the poses are changed Each Vignette comes pre-colored, unassembled, and includes a diorama display base.

item.title: Justice League New 52 Green Arrow Action Figure
item.description: The Green Arrow The New 52 Action Figure stands about 7-inches tall and boasts amazing detail down from his bow and arrow set to his belt. Don't miss out on adding the renegade Oliver Queen to your DC Comics collection with this Green Arrow The New 52 Action Figure!

item.title: DC Unlimited New 52 Hawkman Action Figure
item.description: The DC Unlimited series features a mind-blowing assortment of 7-inch scale action figures that bring tons of detail and plenty of articulation to your desk or toy box Get yours while you can!

item.title: DC Unlimited New 52 Superman Action Figure
item.description: The DC Unlimited series features a mind-blowing assortment of 7-inch scale action figures that bring tons of detail and plenty of articulation to your desk or toy box Get yours while you can!

item.description: The DC Unlimited series features a mind-blowing assortment of 7-inch scale action figures that bring tons of detail and plenty of articulation to your desk or toy box Get yours while you can!

item.title: Justice League New 52 Aquaman Action Figure
item.description: After the acclaimed release of the first figure comes the next wave of figures in the ongoing line based on Geoff Johns and Jim Lee's best-selling JUSTICE LEAGUE Featuring the King of Atlantis from the depths of the ocean this nicely detailed and articulated Justice League New 52 Aquaman Action Figure stands 6 3/4-inches tall and arrives in window box packaging.

item.title: Justice League New 52 Green Lantern Action Figure
item.description: Wielding a weapon of immense power for justice, comes Hal Jordan, the Green Lantern. The Green Lantern action figure stands 6 3/4-inches tall and comes in blister card packaging.

item.title: Justice League New 52 Cyborg Action Figure
item.description: Vic Stone is ready to join the big leagues - and your collection - with this sweet articulated Justice League New 52 Cyborg Action Figure. Cyborg stands 7-inches tall.

item.title: Justice League New 52 Wonder Woman Action Figure
item.description: This Justice League New 52 Wonder Woman Action figure comes directly out of DC Comics' New 52 Wonder Woman comic book and looks absolutely amazing. Articulated action figure stands 6 3/4-inches tall.

item.title: Justice League New 52 Batman Action Figure
item.description: After the acclaimed release of the first figure comes the next wave of figures in the ongoing line based on Geoff Johns and Jim Lee's best-selling JUSTICE LEAGUE Leading the way is the revamped Batman, wearing a unique take on the classic costume as designed by Lee and still putting fear into the heart of criminals everywhere!

item.title: Justice League New 52 Superman Action Figure
item.description: After the acclaimed release of the first figure comes the next wave of figures in the ongoing line based on Geoff Johns and Jim Lee's best-selling JUSTICE LEAGUE When enemies from a distant galaxy threaten the survival of his adopted planet, even the World

item.description: BOOM! Straight from the pages of DC Comics

This Walking Dead TV Series 3 5-inch tall action-figure of Michonne comes with 24 points of articulation, removable poncho, katana sword and katana sheath.

item.title: The Walking Dead Pet Zombie 1 Action Figure
item.description: Zombies make great pets, just ask Michonne! Connected directly to Michonne's past, she has rendered both these walkers harmless by removing their bottom jaw and arms. Now that both Pets are somewhat subdued, she puts them to good use as pack mules and zombie repellent. The Walking Dead TV Series 3 Pet Zombie #1 5-inch action figure comes with a removable backpack, neck chain leash, arms and bottom jaw.

item.description: Michonne is the mysterious stranger who saves Andrea from walkers with her katana blade and two "pet" walkers in tow. She's a quiet but fierce warrior. Connected directly to Michonne's past, she has rendered both these walkers harmless by removing their bottom jaw and arms. Now that they are somewhat subdued, she puts them to good use as pack mules and zombie repellent.

item.title: The Walking Dead Autopsy Zombie Action Figure
item.description: Time to play some operation on a walker! In a desperate attempt to find Sophia, the Autopsy Zombie becomes another victim of Daryl's crossbow. In one of the most gruesome and riveting scenes to date from the series, Rick and Daryl perform an autopsy on this newly fed zombie to find out the contents of his stomach. The Walking Dead TV Autopsy Zombie 5-inch tall action figure includes a knife and removable shirt to reveal either a partially digested hand and woodchuck carcass!

item.title: Darth Maul Light Up ArtFX Statue
item.description: Appearing in Episode I - A Phantom Menace, Maul, an alien Zabrak, was the first member of the Sith to act openly in recorded history, ruthlessly attacking the Jedi Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi. While he may not have survived past that film, Darth Maul left a lasting impression on fans with his unique appearance and amazing lightsaber skills. The all new Darth Maul appears like you've never seen him before. Inspired by Katsushika Hokusai's traditional Japanese ukiyo-e ("pictures of the floating world") style, the Sith warrior balances atop a rocky outcropping in a samurai-like pose. Stripped to the waist, the Zabrak wears a tattered robe that twists and flows with incredible sculpted detail. In his state of undress Maul reveals a body covered in intricate Sith tattoos, while his snarling face captures his hatred for the Jedi and the all-consuming rage in his heart. Of course, no version of Darth Maul would be complete with his blood red double-bladed lightsaber, and this one even has a special light up feature. Sculpted by Junnosuke Abe, Darth Maul stands approximately 11 " (in 1/7th scale with all other Star Wars ARTFX Statues). With its detailed construction and unique styling, this Sith menace is a snap-fit kit that can be put together easily in seconds without glue or modeling skill.

item.title: Darth Vader Light Up ArtFX Statue
item.description: At the height of his power, Darth Vader wields his crimson lightsaber in mortal combat against anyone foolhardy enough to challenge the might of the Galactic Empire. Intricate sculpting brings out the different parts of his chest piece and belt module, while Vader

item.title: Obi-Wan Kenobi Light Up ArtFX Statue
item.description: Left alone to watch over young Luke Skywalker on Tatooine Obi-Wan Kenobi was a powerful Jedi and former galactic hero. When the time came he took up his lightsaber once again to help train the young man and it brought him into direct conflict with the Empire and Darth Vader aboard the first Death Star! Obi-Wan wields both lightsaber and the Force in a battle stance thats defensive and yet powerful at the same time a Kotobukiya original pose! The Jedi has never looked so good with an incredibly detailed sculpt that captures his intricate flowing robes as well as his Alec Guinness-inspired head sculpt. Obi-Wan comes with two different hoods for your choice of display options: up or down. And thats not all; Kenobis iconic blue lightsaber contains an LED for brilliant illumination of this elegant weapon from a more civilized age. Sculpted by Busujimax (Takaboku Busujima) Obi-Wan Kenobi stands approximately 25 cm tall (1/7th scale) on an exclusive display base thats reminiscent of the Death Star flooring. The elder Jedi will look great in your Star Wars collection especially with his light up lightsaber!

item.title: Kotobukiya Superman ARTFX Statue
item.description: Clark Kent is the last surviving son of planet Krypton, sent to Earth to avoid its destruction. The combination of his ancestry and our planet's yellow sun has given him incredible powers which he uses to defend humanity against its greatest threats. Superman stands in a classic heroic pose, his feet spread apart and his fists held tensely at his sides. The intense look on his face captures the Kryptonian's focus and drive, while his intricately sculpted muscles show you that he has the power to back it up. Superman's resplendent red and blue New 52 costume is accurate down to the last detail with its iconic red on yellow "S" emblem, textured suit, technological belt and boots, and of course his long cape. The Man of Steel stands 8 inches tall (in the ARTFX+ 1/10th scale) on his included magnetic display base and is joined by his fellow Justice League members all available separately on our site. item.title: Kotobukiya Cyborg ARTFX Statue
item.description: Joining the previously announced Superman, Green Lantern, Flash, Aquaman, Batman, and Wonder Woman is the final member of the team, Cyborg! Victor Stone was a student athlete who was caught in an explosion at S.T.A.R. Labs while visiting his father Silas. Seeing his son barely clinging to life, Silas performed a radical procedure implanting all sorts of alien and experimental technology into Victor. Reborn as part man and part machine, the young man finds himself defending the Earth against Darkseid alongside its greatest heroes as Cyborg! Cyborg stands nearly 8 1 inches tall in the ARTFX+ 1/10th scale, and was sculpted by Atelier Bamboo (Goutaro Takeuchi). item.title: Kotobukiya The Flash ARTFX Statue
item.description: Barry Allen was a mild-mannered forensic scientist (who was perpetually late) working late at night in his lab when a bolt of lightning changed his life forever. The electricity and chemicals combined mysteriously to imbue Allen with unbelievable speed and thus the Flash was born! Not content merely to stand at attention like his fellow Justice Leaguers Superman and Green Lantern, the Flash can't stay still for a moment. Ready to speed off to fight crime or supervillains with a wide-legged stance, Allen cracks his knuckles in anticipation. The Scarlet Speedster's New 52 costume maintains the character's traditional bright red and yellow color scheme but updates it with a bold new lightning bolt logo and intricate energy lines crackling all over his suit. The Flash's excellent sculpt even includes the new technological details of his costume like the reinforced boots. Standing 7 inches tall (in the ARTFX+ 1/10th scale), the Flash was sculpted by master artist Atelier Bamboo. item.title: Kotobukiya Wonder Woman ARTFX Statue
item.description: Born of Zeus and Hippolyta, Diana was a princess on the paradise island of Themyscira before venturing out into the wider world of humanity. Her first major appearance (in the relaunched New 52 continuity) was the great battle against Darkseid's Parademons in which she teamed up with other heroes to form the Justice League. The magnificent Wonder Woman stands poised with a warrior's strength and a god's grace. Always ready for battle, Diana wears her iconic costume as reinterpreted by Jim Lee in the New 52. Along with her stars and stripes bodice she rocks full pants and tall boots. Wonder Woman's left hand is balled into a fist at her waist, always near the short sword at her back, while her right hand rests over her Lasso of Truth. Of course, no Wonder Woman would be complete without her bracelets and tiara! The Amazon princess features intricate sculpted details in her unique outfit from the stars and eagle design on her top to the subtle armor and paneling on her pants and the creases in her boots. Diana's face captures the character's austere beauty and fierce determination. Standing 7 1 inches tall (in the ARTFX+ 1/10th scale), Wonder Woman was sculpted by master artist Atelier Bamboo. She has magnets in her feet for perfect stability on her included display base (with Justice League logo), and naturally she'll look great on your shelf next to the rest of her powerful allies.

item.title: Kotobukiya Darth Vader ArtFX Statue
item.description: An all new representation of the iconic villain, Vader joins the elite lineup of your favorite heroes and villains from the original Star Wars films in the Saga Collection, following great statues like The Empire Strikes Back version, Boba Fett, C-3PO, and R2-D2. More powerful than ever before in the Force as well as mastery of the lightsaber, Darth Vader prepares for his final battle as the Rebel fleet hammers the fully operational Death Star. Updated to match his appearance in Return of the Jedi, the fallen Jedi stands with his crimson lightsaber at the ready for both attack and defense. A tall and imposing figure, Vader is like a coiled viper with his legs slightly bent and his lightsaber held in both hands. The Dark Lord's armour is intricately detailed and sculpted perfectly to match its appearance in the film with all of the mechanical and cloth elements distinctly textured. You can even display Vader in a variety of poses and looks with multiple interchangeable arm parts and head pieces featuring the iconic helmet or the unmasked Anakin Skywalker! Like all Star Wars ARTFX+ Statues, he has magnets in his feet for display on the included base. ARTFX+ Statues are fun-to-assemble pre-painted snap-fit kits that can be easily put together in seconds without glue or modeling skill. Darth Vader stands approximately 7.5 inches tall (1/10th scale) and is the perfect centerpiece for your Saga Collection! /p>

item.title: Gentle Giant Star Wars AT-AT Bookends

First seen on screen at the Battle of Hoth, the feared AT-AT is the primary assault vehicle of the Galactic Empire for large-scale ground warfare. Tasked with destroying the Rebel's shield generator, the Imperial AT-AT Walkers completed their objective with ruthless efficiency, laying waste to many Rebel soldiers, vehicles, and installations in the process. item.title: Kotobukiya Iron Man Mark 42 ArtFX Statue
item.description: Iron Man blasts into action in this dynamically sculpted statue, churning up water beneath him with his thrusters. The pose catches the superhero leaning back as he fires his repulsor ray from his outstretched right hand, clenching the left for a follow up attack. The Mark 42 is resplendent in metallic red and gold with a subtle new pattern unlike any of the armors before it. This version also comes equipped with a LED light-up feature in his eyes and arc reactor; three settings (Off, Continuous On, and triggered by the built-in sound detector) let you choose how and when Iron Man activates for battle. Iron Man Mark 42 stands 15 inches tall (1/6th scale) hovering over the lifelike water effect. This pre-painted, snap-fit ARTFX Statue is easy to assemble so you can have your Iron Man on display in no time. item.title: Sideshow Batman Sixth Scale Figure
item.description: Bruce Wayne springs into action as his famed alter ego. Disguised in a hand-tailored blue and grey fabric Batsuit and cape, he is crafted with meticulous attention to detail on a fully articulated muscular new body design. Inspired by a number of timeless comic book appearances, the Batman Sixth Scale Figure invites collectors to further define their favorite look for the Dark Knight with short and long-eared mask options, and two no-nonsense facial expressions able to strike fear into the hearts of his enemies. Equipped with a variety of hi-tech 'Bat'-prefixed gadgets, utility belt and grapple hook gun, the Caped Crusader is always one step ahead of his foes... and for times of true crisis he keeps a powerful gift from his closest friend nearby in the form of a green Kryptonite ring. item.title: Sideshow Snake Plissken Sixth Scale Figure
item.description: Chock full o' attitude, we've brought the all-American escape artist to life with a highly detailed likeness of Snake, as portrayed by actor Kurt Russell. Sporting his full abdomen cobra tattoo, Plissken is decked out in his trademark duds, including eyepatch, muscle shirt, distressed leather jacket, urban camo pants, catcher's shin guards and combat boots. Ready to take on the Duke, we've armed the one-eyed warrior with a complete arsenal of modified firepower. Holstered at his side is the USPF-issued sub-machine gun with detachable silencer, scope and spare mags, his sidearm revolver with scope, and an array of throwing stars. Cigarette in one hand, Snake is fully equipped with a radio and homing device - and just so there's no funny business, he's shackled up with wrist time-clock and tracker. item.title: Sideshow Predator 2 Maquette
item.description: The sequel film introduced fans to a more colorful Predator for the urban setting, and Sideshow's artisans have faithfully hand-painted the vibrant complex skin patterns of the ruthless hunter with unrivaled authenticity. Fitted with tribal garb and gear comprised of gladiator-like armor, fabric netted body suit, and backpack with medi-kit, the vicious warrior wields his sophisticated yet brutal weapons of choice, including leg cartridge net launcher, razor sharp wrist gauntlets and customary plasma cannon. Standing over 28 inches tall, in roughly 1:4 scale, the Predator 2 maquette captures every aspect of the cinema icon in a truly unique and customizable display, featuring interchangeable masked and unmasked portraits, and a swap out accessory hand with combi-stick spear.
